Career Paths: Employers

Photo by Pexels

Below is a list of the principal addiction services providers in Chautauqua County. Links will take you to their careers/jobs website or to their homepage.

  • Chautauqua County Department of Mental Hygiene
  • Chautauqua County Department of Health and Human Services
  • The Mental Health Association in Chautauqua County
  • Prevention Works
  • The Chautauqua Center
  • The Resource Center
  • Brooks-TLC
  • UPMC Chautauqua
  • Evergreen Health
  • Recovery Options Made Easy
  • ALSTAR EMS
  • About
  • Contact

  • YouTube
  • Instagram
  • Twitter

If you're having difficulty finding help for an addiction, or if you have any questions, contact us directly and we'll get in touch with you. Contact us here
